description.value: At 15th level, you may grow to Large size as a standard action. At this size you gain a +6 size bonus to Strength, a â€“2 penalty to Dexterity, a +4 size bonus to Constitution, and a +4 natural armor bonus. You may return to your normal size as a standard action. You may remain in this size for up to 1 minute per character level per day; this duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be used in 1 minute increments.
